page.title: 16NURSERY SCHOOL MIDDLETON
page.content: Cannam House is owned by Mrs Saunders who runs the school there with two assistants. 45 children are on the register and they come from a 5 mile radius. It is open every weekday morning between 8.45a.m. and 12.15p.m. The cost is one pound 25pence per day (60p. if a child is away).The Council provide a third of a pint of milk daily for each child. About 24 children attend each session & they play in the sand or Wendy house and on bikes.There is also a rocking horse,water tray and slide. The children also cut out,paste and paint,or play with jigsaws and board games.They always have a story, sing-songs and play games such as Farmer in his Den and Grandmother's Footsteps.
